name: Alpha Corruptor
description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

name: K-Drive Launcher
description: Summons a K-Drive for use during free roam missions

name: Ki'Teer Fireworks
description: A bombastic symphony of color.

name: Kinetic Siphon Trap
description: Specialized trap for attracting and slowing the movement of synthesis targets.

name: Kriller Bait
description: This bait is synthesized from Methacalcene-1 that is known to attract Krillers, a Servofish found in lakes during warm weather.

name: Kuaka Echo-Lure
description: Entice and attract nearby Kuaka with life-like animal calls. Kuaka inhabit the Plains of Eidolon.

name: Kuaka Pheromone Oota
description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Kuaka.

name: Kubrodon Echo-Lure
description: Entice and attract nearby Kubrodon with life-like animal calls. The Kubrodon is most often found around the Craters in Orb Vallis.

name: Kubrodon Pheromone Synthesizer
description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Kubrodon.

name: Lanzo Fishing Spear
description: The barbed prongs on this fishing spear make it easier to catch fish with smooth skin.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: The barbed prongs on this fishing spear make it easier to catch fish with smooth skin.

components.name: Ferrite
components.description: Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.Locations: Mercury, Earth, Lua, Neptune, and the Void.

components.name: Grokdrul
components.description: A noxious mix of polysaccharides and long-chain polymers, Grokdrul is a standard chemical used in Grineer manufacturing.Location: Plains of Eidolon

components.name: Nistlepod
components.description: Used by the Nistlebrush to trap and kill prey.Location: Plains of Eidolon

name: Lapis Antitoxin
description: This is an extremely effective antitoxin.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: This is an extremely effective antitoxin.

components.name: Moonlight Dragonlily
components.description: This uncommon plant can only be found at night.Location: Earth

components.name: Moonlight Jadeleaf
components.description: This rare plant can only be found at night.Location: Earth

components.name: Sunlight Dragonlily
components.description: This uncommon plant can only be found during the day.

components.name: Sunlight Jadeleaf
components.description: This rare plant can only be found during the day.

name: Laserturret
description: Launches homing missiles

name: Loc-Pin
description: A persistent waypoint marker for use with the world map. Coordinate your squad and track places of importance!

components.description: A persistent waypoint marker for use with the world map. Coordinate your squad and track places of importance!

name: Longwinder Bait
description: This bait is synthesized from beryzene that is known to attract Longwinders, a Servofish found in lake hotspots during warm weather.

name: Luminous Dye
description: Dyes the waters with a compound that sticks to fish passing through it, making them easier to see from the shore.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Dyes the waters with a compound that sticks to fish passing through it, making them easier to see from the shore.

components.name: Iradite
components.description: A valuable mineral found on the Plains.

name: Magic Debug Lure
description: Debugging only - don't ship this!

name: Med-Tower
description: Ordis delivers a Med-Tower to restore health to nearby allies.

name: Mergoo Echo-Lure
description: Entice and attract nearby Mergoo with life-like animal calls. Mergoo inhabit the Plains of Eidolon.

name: Mergoo Pheromone Oota
description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Mergoo.

name: Mirewinder Bait
description: This bait is comprised of aromatic tetraxin that is known to attract Mirewinders, a Servofish found in cave pools.

name: Moa Specter
description: Deploys a MOA EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Deploys a MOA EXIMUS unit to fight for you.

name: Murkray Bait
description: This bait is comprised of materials that are known to attract Murkrays, a fish found only in ocean hotspots during both day and night.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: This bait is comprised of materials that are known to attract Murkrays, a fish found only in ocean hotspots during both day and night.

components.name: Fish Meat
components.description: Used as a source of food and to create bait for predatory fish.

components.name: Goopolla Spleen
components.description: Used in Ostron remedies to purify toxins.Location: Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus

components.name: Mortus Horn
components.description: The horn of a Mortus Lungfish is ground down into a powder and used by the Ostrons in herbal remedies.

components.name: Tralok Eyes
components.description: The Ostron boil these into a jelly which forms a strong adhesive when it dries.Location: Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus

name: Narrow-Spectrum Bait
description: This endochlor/dionium melange attracts both Recasters and Eye-Eyes, Servofish found in ponds. The Eye-Eye shows up during warm weather and Recaster shows up at Hot Spots during cool weather.

name: Necramech Summon
description: Summon a Necramech to the battlefield.

name: Nexifera Echo-Lure
description: Entice and attract nearby Nexifera with life-like animal calls.

name: Nexifera Pheromone Gland
description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Nexifera.

name: Nightfall Apothic
description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.

components.description: This robust, carnivorous plant has adapted to conditions in polluted waters.Location: Grineer Shipyard - Ceres

components.description: This uncommon plant can only be found at night.Location: Earth

components.description: An amorphous solid. Possibly Orokin technology.Locations: Mercury, Mars, Phobos, Europa, and Pluto.

components.name: Sunlight Threshcone
components.description: This common plant can only be found during the day.

name: Omni
description: An Omni is a multi-use Railjack tool for extinguishing fires, grounding electrical hazards, and repairing hull ruptures. Use outside the Railjack to instantly recall back to the ship.

description: Fully restores all ammo types.

name: Oplink
description: A device used to manage coordination and resources during Operation Link missions.

name: Override
description: Ordis hacks into enemy systems and disrupts security protocols for a short period.

description: This bait is synthesized from specialized A-disulphex-A compounds that are known to attract Synathid, a legendarily rare Servofish found only in cave hotspots.

name: Virmink Echo-Lure
description: Entice and attract nearby Virmink with life-like animal calls. The Virmink is most often found around the Lakes in Orb Vallis.

name: Virmink Pheromone Synthesizer
description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Virmink.

name: Vome Residue
description: A gobbet of raw flesh, fallen from the wyrm Vome in her death spasm. Used to attract Chondricord and Duroid.

name: Vortex
description: Creates a whirling mass of energy that violently attracts nearby enemies, crushing their atoms into a tiny spec of matter.

name: Vulpaphyla Echo-Lure
description: Entice and attract nearby Vulpaphyla with life-like animal calls.

name: Wolf Beacon
description: Lures the Wolf out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where the assassin would normally appear.

name: Zanuka Hunter Beacon
description: Lures the Zanuka Hunter out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where the assassin would normally appear.
